[[Image:Stonehelm Pin.png|right|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of Stonehelm on the continent of Westeros.]]
'''Stonehelm''' is a castle in [[the Stormlands]] and the seat of [[House Swann]], a vassal house holding fealty to [[House Baratheon]] of [[Storm's End]]. The castle is located southwest of Storm's End on the northern shore of the [[Sea of Dorne]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/storms-end/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Storm's End entry]</ref><ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season1/#!/locations/stonehelm/ HBO viewers guide, season 1 map, Stonehelm entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Stonehelm is located at the mouth of a river, at the south end of Cape Wrath and east of the Dornish Marches. It was built to oversee a major river route inland to the Stormlands.
